name: David Deejay
description: '''Adi Cristian Colceru''', also known as '''David Deejay''' (born December 10, 1980, in BÃ¢rlad), is a Romanian former [[DJ]], [[record producer]] and [[composer]] from [[Bucharest]], Romania. He studied violin in primary school. After moving to [[Bucharest]], he worked with several local producers, and in 2007 started with the hit single "Sexy Thing". He subsequently released several singles after the success of Sexy Thing such as Temptation and Fantasy. He is best known for his long time collaborations with singer Dony from the band Refflex. David Deejay is a pioneer of the Romanian [[Popcorn (Romanian music style)|popcorn]] music style.
